title: Kids & Teens Studio
summary: Age-appropriate cuts with streaming entertainment and comfort-first finishes.
description: Our stylists specialize in first cuts and back-to-school refreshes with patience, tactile tools, and entertainment built in. Parents can join at the styling chair or relax in the lounge while we deliver a confident, photo-ready finish.
processTitle: Kid-approved from check-in to photo finish
processDescription: Parents can relax while we guide little ones through the experience with patience, distraction, and pro styling.

processSteps.title: Warm welcome & setup
processSteps.description: Choose the right station, entertainment, and cape so every child feels comfortable.

processSteps.title: Texture-aware cut
processSteps.description: Gentle clipper and shear work paced to each child, with sensory breaks whenever needed.

processSteps.title: Reveal & parent tips
processSteps.description: Final style, celebratory photo moment, and guidance to keep the look fresh between visits.
